text: Sandra Bullock Stuns in Sequined Dress on 2018 Oscars Red Carpet Sandra Bullock turned heads in a shimmering look on the red carpet at the 2018 Oscars on Sunday. The 53 - year - old Oscar - winning actress showed up in a custom - made gold and black sequined, high - neck, silk Louis Vuitton halter gown and wore her long brown hair down.
